## Hi there <img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/hvRJCLFzcasrR4ia7z/giphy.gif" width="25px"/>

I am a Full Stack Developer specializes in Python (Django, Flask) & JavaScript technologies (Angular, Node.js). Experience designing, planning, building enterprise-grade scalable and distributed applications and REST APIs.
